scripts.preview: turbo run wasm-pack && turbo run build && turbo run preview
scripts.release:all: turbo run wasm-pack && turbo run build && turbo run release
scripts.release:front: turbo run wasm-pack && turbo run build && turbo run release --filter=hoodik-web
scripts.start:front: turbo run wasm-pack && turbo run dev --filter=hoodik-web
scripts.start: turbo run wasm-pack && turbo run dev
scripts.unit: turbo run wasm-pack && turbo run test:unit
scripts.all: turbo run type-check && turbo run test:unit && ./e2e
